name: Music_2081.wav
keywords: ['alternative rock', 'male voice', 'distortion guitars', 'male backing voice', 'bass', 'percussion', 'moderate tempo', 'aggressive percussion']
caption: This alternative rock song features a male voice singing the main melody at a high pitch. Other male voices sing in harmony after the main voice pauses. This is accompanied by powerful percussion playing a rock beat in common time. Distortion guitars play power chords. One of the guitars plays the same melody as the backing voices on the lead guitar. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. This song is played at a moderate tempo. The mood of this song is upbeat. This song can be played in a Transformers style movie.
